PyWavelets - Discrete Wavelet Transform in Python
=================================================

.. note:: 

    This documetation covers PyWavelets 0.2 release.
    Documetation for the 0.1.6 release is still available at
    http://www.pybytes.com/pywavelets/0.1.6/.

   regression/index
   dev/index
   resources
